item.description:
We'll be meeting at Samadhi Yoga again, and continuing to watch and discuss the Intro to AQAL dvd. We'll get takeout again for dinner, and if you prefer you are also welcome to bring your own food.

If you take the T, it's the Newton Center T-stop, about 2 minute walk to the studio. Newton Center is on the D-branch of the Green Line. The studio is just above Pier 1 on Beacon St.

Our last meeting at Samadhi was wonderful. The space is quiet, intimate, lovely, and comfortable, and enabled us to have conversation as a large group without the noise interference and seating difficulties we've experienced in restaurants.

Hope to see you there!

For more information, see http://www.samadhiyog...
item.name: Boston Ken Wilber Group March Meetup
